languages.text: Последние координаты привели Вольного Торговца к наиболее мерзкому из всех зрелищ, встреченных на этом долгом пути, но здесь Лорд-капитан наконец смог получить достойную награду.

traits.locale_text: Последние координаты привели Вольного Торговца к наиболее мерзкому из всех зрелищ, встреченных на этом долгом пути, но здесь Лорд-капитан наконец смог получить достойную награду.

languages.text: The final set of coordinates brought the Rogue Trader to the most abhorrent of all the sights {mf|he|she} has encountered on this long journey — yet at the end of it, at last, the Lord Captain found a worthy reward.
languages.original_text: Последние координаты привели Вольного Торговца к наиболее мерзкому из всех зрелищ, встреченных на этом долгом пути, но здесь Лорд-капитан наконец смог получить достойную награду.

traits.locale_text: The final set of coordinates brought the Rogue Trader to the most abhorrent of all the sights {mf|he|she} had encountered on this long journey — yet at the end of it, at last, the Lord Captain found a worthy reward.

The final set of coordinates brought the Rogue Trader to the most abhorrent of all the sights {mf|he|she} had encountered on this long journey — yet at the end of it, at last, the Lord Captain found a worthy reward.

The final set of coordinates brought the Rogue Trader to the most abhorrent of all the sights {mf|he|she} has encountered on this long journey — yet at the end of it, at last, the Lord Captain found a worthy reward.

The final set of coordinates brought the Rogue Trader to the most abhorrent of all the sights {mf|he|she} has encountered on this long journey — yet at the end of it, at last, the Lord Captain found a worthy reward.

languages.text: Les dernières coordonnées ont mené {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} jusqu'au spectacle le plus odieux qu'il lui ait été donné de voir au cours de ce long voyage. Cependant, une belle récompense l'attendait.
languages.original_text: The final set of coordinates brought the Rogue Trader to the most abhorrent of all the sights {mf|he|she} has encountered on this long journey — yet at the end of it, at last, the Lord Captain found a worthy reward.

traits.locale_text: Les dernières coordonnées ont mené {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} jusqu'au spectacle le plus odieux qu'il lui ait été donné de voir au cours de ce long voyage. Cependant, une belle récompense l'attendait.

languages.text: 行商浪人沿着最后一组坐标前进，看到了这场漫长的旅程中最为令人憎恶的景象。然而，到了最后，行商浪人终于得到了值得的奖赏。
languages.original_text: The final set of coordinates brought the Rogue Trader to the most abhorrent of all the sights {mf|he|she} has encountered on this long journey — yet at the end of it, at last, the Lord Captain found a worthy reward.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人沿着最后一组坐标前进，看到了这场漫长的旅程中最为令人憎恶的景象。然而，到了最后，行商浪人终于得到了值得的奖赏。

languages.text: 最後の座標は、自由開拓者がこの長い旅で遭遇した光景の中でも群を抜いて嫌悪を催させるものだった。しかしその果てに、ついにロード・キャプテンはこの上ない報酬を見つけることができた。
languages.original_text: The final set of coordinates brought the Rogue Trader to the most abhorrent of all the sights {mf|he|she} has encountered on this long journey — yet at the end of it, at last, the Lord Captain found a worthy reward.

traits.locale_text: 最後の座標は、自由開拓者がこの長い旅で遭遇した光景の中でも群を抜いて嫌悪を催させるものだった。しかしその果てに、ついにロード・キャプテンはこの上ない報酬を見つけることができた。

languages.text: Der letzte Satz an Koordinaten führte {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu dem abstoßendsten Anblick, den {mf|er|sie} auf dieser langen Reise ertragen musste. Doch am Ende fand der Lord Captain endlich eine würdige Belohnung.
languages.original_text: The final set of coordinates brought the Rogue Trader to the most abhorrent of all the sights {mf|he|she} has encountered on this long journey — yet at the end of it, at last, the Lord Captain found a worthy reward.

traits.locale_text: Der letzte Satz an Koordinaten führte {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu dem abstoßendsten Anblick, den {mf|er|sie} auf dieser langen Reise ertragen musste. Doch am Ende fand der Lord Captain endlich eine würdige Belohnung.

languages.text: Las últimas coordenadas ofrecen a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente el espectáculo más espantoso que ha presenciado en sus periplos... pero al final, la recompensa que ha encontrado {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ha valido la pena.
languages.original_text: The final set of coordinates brought the Rogue Trader to the most abhorrent of all the sights {mf|he|she} has encountered on this long journey — yet at the end of it, at last, the Lord Captain found a worthy reward.

traits.locale_text: Las últimas coordenadas ofrecen a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente el espectáculo más espantoso que ha presenciado en sus periplos... pero al final, la recompensa que ha encontrado {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ha valido la pena.

languages.text: Son koordinat dizisi, Hür Tacir'i bu uzun yolculuk boyunca maruz kaldığı en tiksinti uyandırıcı manzarayla karşı karşıya getirdi. Ancak Lord Kaptan nihayetinde değerli bir ödülün sahibi oldu.
languages.original_text: The final set of coordinates brought the Rogue Trader to the most abhorrent of all the sights {mf|he|she} has encountered on this long journey — yet at the end of it, at last, the Lord Captain found a worthy reward.
